title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' function does not work reliably. To reproduce the issue: Close all editors, create a new file f1.txt, and then select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. However, nothing happens.
EB: The 'Close All Saved' function should close the file as no changes have been made.
SR: To reproduce the issue: Close all editors, create a new file f1.txt, and then select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
